title: BimlFlex for Azure Mapping Data Flows
description: In Microsoft Azure, the Mapping Data Flows ('Data Flows') feature of Azure Data Factory (ADF) is the visual data integration solution. It can be positioned as the cloud data integration alternative that predominantly supports the 'Extract-Transform-Load' (ETL) paradigm.
